backend/main.mo: Defines core types and in‑memory maps for orders, bookings, loyalty, artifacts, districts, and authorization, forming the backend actor's data model.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for the homepage and routing updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files, mainly describing hooks, pages, styling, and navigation behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS theme variables and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Provides the global layout with header, footer, page outlet, and conditional bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Protects admin-only pages by checking identity and admin status, showing login or denial UI as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow with loading states and error recovery.
Displays a date picker and static time slot options for selecting booking availability.
frontend/src/components/BookingRequestFo: Form component for submitting booking requests with date, zone, notes, and optional package customization.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with route-aware buttons and icons for main app sections.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeLiveCou: Displays three live metric counters with fallback values, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/InAppNotificatio: Displays a dismissible in-app alert banner with a message and close button.
frontend/src/components/LoyaltyPointsPan: Shows the user's loyalty points balance and transaction history, with login and loading states handled.
frontend/src/components/LoyaltyRedemptio: Lists redeemable rewards, shows current points, and allows users to redeem rewards if eligible.
frontend/src/components/MembershipProfil: Handles viewing or creating a membership profile with verification and login states.
frontend/src/components/OriginMapSection: Displays a map and list of districts, letting users select one to view its details and farmer info.
frontend/src/components/PackageCustomize: Allows selecting a base package and toggling add-ons, with loading and data-fetching states.
frontend/src/components/SocialImpactMete: Shows environmental impact metrics in a grid, with loading handling.
frontend/src/components/VirtualTourSecti: A UI section allowing users to switch between virtual tour zones and view panoramas or placeholders.
frontend/src/data/menuItems.ts: Defines menu item types, categories, and a full list of menu entries with helper category filters.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderStatusPolling: Polls order and queue status, computes countdowns, and triggers notifications on status changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, orders, queue summaries, artifacts, and mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnalyticsP: Fetches and displays high‑level business analytics such as orders, users, bookings, and members.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingsPa: Lists all space bookings for admins with status controls and refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminElectricit: Placeholder panel for ATS and electricity monitoring with a coming‑soon notice.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInventoryP: Placeholder inventory management panel showing a coming‑soon alert.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLoyaltyRew: Allows admins to add loyalty rewards and view existing ones, with form validation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLoyaltyVer: Displays all membership requests and allows admins to approve or reject them using verification mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMuseumCont: Provides a form to create new artifacts and lists existing artifacts for management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersQueu: Shows active orders with status controls, enabling admins to update order states and refresh the queue.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOriginMapP: Allows creation of district entries with product and description details and displays all districts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPackagesPa: Manages creation of base packages and add‑ons while listing existing ones.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSocialImpa: Lets admins update impact metrics and displays the current metric values.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page showing tabbed panels for orders, inventory, ATS, analytics, museum content, bookings, and related tools behind an admin gate.
frontend/src/pages/ArtifactDetailPage.ts: Displays an artifact’s details with optional audio playback, handling loading and error states, and provides navigation back to the museum.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with a hero section, promotional content, feature cards, and navigation to menu and museum sections.
frontend/src/pages/LoyaltyPage.tsx: Loyalty program page with tabs for membership profile, points, and rewards components.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Menu page showing categorized items and a real-time kitchen queue summary with estimated wait times.
frontend/src/pages/MiniMuseumPage.tsx: Displays a mini museum with QR‑scannable artifacts, map origins, and social impact metrics using fetched data.
frontend/src/pages/OrderStatusPage.tsx: Shows real‑time order tracking with status polling, notifications, and fallback handling for missing orders.
frontend/src/pages/SpaceBookingPage.tsx: Provides booking and virtual tour tabs with a booking calendar and request form.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, feature list, known issues, and high‑level design notes for the ongoing web/app build.
